name: Scarlet Road Ship Blueprint Package
desc: Enables heavy industry to construct the ship hulls from the "Scarlet Road" school of design.

name: Scarlet Road Weapon Blueprint Package
desc: Enables heavy industry to construct the weapons from the "Scarlet Road" school of design.

name: Scarlet Road Fighter and Drone Blueprint Package
desc: Enables heavy industry to construct the "Scarlet Road" Fighter and Drone LCPs.
